scripts.build:vscode: npm run build:vscode:light && npm run build:vscode:dark && vsce package
scripts.build:vscode:light: mustache colours.json src/vscode/colours-light.mustache.json | mustache - src/vscode/theme.mustache.json > themes/vscode/glimmerized-light.json
scripts.build:vscode:dark: mustache colours.json src/vscode/colours-dark.mustache.json | mustache - src/vscode/theme.mustache.json > themes/vscode/glimmerized-dark.json
